author: Predeactor
description: Obtain one of the most beautiful image representing Hatsune Miku!
short: Obtain a random image of Miku.
install_msg:
Hey, thank for using my API! If you encouter **any problems**, even from the API, please contact me, `Capitaine Predeactor#0495`, I'll do my best to fix it.

**Note:** By using this API, the IP of your bot may be logged in order to use this API, this is for ratelimiting/logging purpose only.
